results.title: Metformin alleviates muscle wasting post-thermal injury by increasing Pax7-positive muscle progenitor cells
results.text_hl: To determine whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can attenuate muscle catabolism following @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn injury@@@, we utilized a 30% total @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ surface area (TBSA) full-thickness scald @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and compared @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn injuries@@@ with and without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

results.title: In Vitro and In Vivo Evaluation of Metformin Hydrochloride Hydrogels Developed with Experimental Design in the Treatment of Burns.
results.text_hl: Two groups, each consisting of seven Wistar rats with a @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ model, were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Poloxamer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020442 @@@poloxamer 407@@@  gels at doses of 4 mg/g and 8 mg/g for 29 days.

results.title: Engineered, Radially Aligned, Gradient-Metformin-Eluting Nanofiber Dressings Accelerate Burn-Wound Healing.
results.text_hl: Moreover, the in vivo @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@-wound-healing model of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ showed that the radially aligned gradient @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-eluting @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@poly(lactic-co-glycolic acid)@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@) nanofibers exhibited significantly superior healing capability compared to the pristine @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-eluting, and control dressings.

citations.NLM: Chen SH, Kuo HJ, Chou PY, Tsai CH, Chen SH, Yao YC, Liu SJ. Engineered, Radially Aligned, Gradient-Metformin-Eluting Nanofiber Dressings Accelerate Burn-Wound Healing. Int J Nanomedicine. 2024;19():11463-11477. PMID: 39530106

results.title: Metabolic and Nutritional Support.
results.text_hl: There is an increasing body of literature for nutrition and metabolic treatment and supplementation to counter the hypermetabolic and catabolic response secondary to @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn injury@@@. Early and adequate nutrition is key in addition to adjunctive therapies, such as @CHEMICAL_Oxandrolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010074 @@@oxandrolone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Shahrokhi S, Jeschke MG. Metabolic and Nutritional Support. Surg Clin North Am. 2023 Jun;103(3):473-482. PMID: 37149383

results.title: Influence of metformin on glucose intolerance and muscle catabolism following severe burn injury.
results.text_hl: METHODS: In a double-blind, randomized manner, 8 adult @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (850 mg every 8 hours x 7 days), while 5 @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received placebo.
